verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Mahalath. A Maskil of David.) The fool <WH5036> has said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> "There <WH369> is no <WH369> God, <WH430>" They are corrupt, <WH7843> and have committed <WH8581> abominable <WH8581> injustice; <WH5766> There <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> who does <WH6213> good. <WH9185>

God <WH430> has looked <WH8259> down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064> upon the sons <WH1121> of men, <WH120> To see <WH7200> if there <WH3426> is anyone who understands, <WH7919> Who seeks <WH1875> after God. <WH430>

Every <WH3605> one <WH3605> of them has turned <WH5472> aside; <WH5472> together <WH9191> they have become <WH444> corrupt; <WH444> There <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> who does <WH6213> good, <WH9185> not even <WH1571> one. <WH259>

Have <WH3045> the workers <WH6466> of wickedness <WH205> no <WH3808> knowledge, <WH3045> Who eat <WH398> up My people <WH5971> [as though] they ate <WH398> bread, <WH3899> And have not called <WH7121> upon God <WH430>?

There <WH8033> they were in great <WH6343> fear <WH6343> [where] no <WH3808> fear <WH6343> had been; <WH1961> For God <WH430> scattered <WH6340> the bones <WH6106> of him who encamped <WH2583> against you; You put <WH954> [them] to shame, <WH954> because <WH3588> God <WH430> had rejected <WH3988> them.

Oh, <WH4310> <WH5414> that the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> would come out of Zion! <WH6726> When God <WH430> restores <WH7725> His captive <WH7622> people, <WH5971> Let Jacob <WH3290> rejoice, <WH1523> let Israel <WH3478> be glad. <WH8055>
